info.header: Ports and Maritime Resources of Peru
info.subheader: Discover the main Peruvian ports, tools and maritime resources in one place.

chancay.title: Port of Chancay
chancay.desc: High-capacity Peruvian port terminal located in Chancay, Huaral. First intelligent and automated port in South America with advanced infrastructure and 24/7 operations.

callao.title: Port of Callao
callao.desc: Peru's main port, strategic for South Pacific maritime trade. Depth up to 16 meters and capacity for large container ships.

paita.title: Port of Paita
paita.desc: Northern maritime port and second busiest container hub in Peru, specializing in agricultural and seafood exports.

info.toolsDesc: Access professional platforms to visualize global maritime traffic, ships, routes and cargo tracking.
